title: Terraform Industries' Crossroads — Strategic Trigger (SCOS decision)

coreProducts: Smart robotic arms for modular construction

operationalSignals.largestSuppliersRenegotiation: Two largest suppliers demanding quarterly price renegotiations

stakeholderVoices.name: CFO
stakeholderVoices.quote: Cautious about €5M risk and hidden change costs. Concerned about ROI timeline and budget impact.

stakeholderVoices.name: Engineering
stakeholderVoices.quote: Supports the proposal due to competitive pressure and need for modernization.

stakeholderVoices.name: Procurement Director
stakeholderVoices.quote: Fears supplier trust erosion and potential disruption to long-standing relationships.

stakeholderVoices.name: HR
stakeholderVoices.quote: Warns of potential union strike and need for careful change management.

stakeholderVoices.name: IG Metall Chapter Representative
stakeholderVoices.quote: We represent 14 employees whose roles could be affected. We need guarantees about job security, retraining opportunities, and transparency about how the system will be used.

keyPoints: GenAI in industrial supply chains is accelerating
Early adopters report 10–20% reduction in lead times and cost volatility
Firms without stakeholder integration face backlash and reputational risk
Cut raw material volatility costs by 15%
Faced supplier turnover, grew market share by 7%

decisionOptions.title: Full SCOS Rollout (AI-Driven Transformation)
implications: Major organizational change across five departments

constraints: Supplier trust and long-term partnerships are core values
Union concerns about job security and transparency
Margins already compressed and input costs up 20%
